comment: Obama doesn't believe in making stuff up. So he'd never say anything like "If you like your doctor you can keep your doctor." Or blame the Benghazi massacre on a YouTube video.

                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Obama"))
            :ARG1 (m2 / make-up-10
                  :ARG0 p

            :ARG1 (a / anything

                                          :ARG1 y
                                          :ARG2 (d / doctor))))
                        :condition (l / like-01
                              :ARG0 y
                              :ARG1 (d2 / doctor
                                    :poss y))))
            :time (e / ever))
      :snt3 (o / or
            :op2 (b2 / blame-01
                  :ARG1 (m3 / massacre-01

                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Benghazi")))
                  :medium (v / video

                                    :op1 "YouTube"))))))
